question: The ‘Civil Lekha Samman’ Awards is related to which Indian civil service?
option1:
Indian Administrative Service
Indian Administrative Service
explanation:
The Indian Civil Accounts Service (ICAS) is celebrating March 1 every year as the “Civil Accounts Day”. Recently, the 44th Civil Accounts Day function was hosted in New Delhi and was attended by the Union Minister Nirmala Sitharaman.
The Finance Minister presented the ‘Civil Lekha Samman’ Awards to the Best Performing Accounts Offices and Best performing units. Dr. T V Somanathan, Secretary (Expenditure) and Soma Roy Burman, Controller General of Accounts also participated in the event.
